title: I really like what Riot has done to new Akali's face
body:
She now has more visually distinct attributes. After Kai'sa the game really needed to avoid further same face-itis {{champion:145}} {{champion:39}} 

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/011/847/608/large/jessica-oyhenart-akali-portrait.jpg?1531749751

let's put it this way 
which do you prefer a beautiful woman or a unique face woman?

I am not sure if I understand your question, but here are my 2 cents: There are 2 important parts of the characters design - characters should look diferent from each other and their look should be on the same page as their lore. Akali's design does both perfectly. It is not the beauty (or the lack of it) that matters in most cases. And the analogy for a daughter is pretty out of place here, as we are talking about video game character, not actual woman.

> characters should look diferent from each other

So why are not the other ionian women like that?

Small nose, Round eyes and an oval face are the clear norm.

It's amazing to see anything positive about Akali on the forums right now.

Same here, I remember getting the skin back before TT was updated, and just running Mejai's, Sword of the Occult, and Leviathan on Akali in 3v3 and just wrecking face XD So I bought Blood Moon Akali because the splash art was just so much more appealing than the other skins.

Now, while I'll be sad to see the current splash art go, I do think they did the skin justice with the new splash. I'm just waiting to see if they did anything special with her VFX. You can't have a Blood Moon skin anymore without those VFX, and special recall, that the newer skins in the line have made a standard. Hopefully they didn't leave Akali behind.
